contentrichtext.text: {{for|other places named Pyrgos|Pyrgos (disambiguation)}} '''Pyrgos''' (also Myrtos-Pyrgos) is an archaeological site of the [[Minoan civilization]] near [[Myrtos]] in the municipality of [[Ierapetra]] on the south coast of [[Crete]]. ==Archaeology== [[File:Pyrgos Myrtos overlooking the Libyan Sea.jpg|thumb|Pyrgos Myrtos overlooking the Libyan Sea]] This Minoan settlement on the road to [[Ierapetra]] boasts several Minoan features: a drain, paved floors and footpaths and [[ashlar]] foundation blocks for its central building. ==External links== *http://www.minoancrete.com/pyrgos.htm * http://www.minoan-aegis.be/field-projects/myrtos-pyrgos/?lang=en {{coord|35|00|25|N|25|35|26|E|display=title|region:GR_type:landmark_source:nlwiki}} [[Category:Minoan sites in Crete]] [[Category:Ierapetra]] [[Category:Populated places in Ancient Greece]] [[Category:Former populated places in Greece]] {{AncientGreece-stub}} {{europe-archaeology-stub}} {{Crete-geo-stub}} [[de:Pyrgos]] [[pt:Pyrgos (Myrtos)]]
